name: Overboard (HarryCoke)
description:
My first game, built in Unity for a university assignment. Very rudimentary but I'm still quite pleased with it as a learning experience.

The aim is to collect survivors from the sea and deliver them to the ladder at the top of the screen. If there are too many people in your boat, you must throw some overboard or the boat will sink.  Try and rescue as many survivors as you can before they freeze.

Click around the boat to move. Click on the boat to throw people overboard. Press 'Esc' to quit.

For some reason the audio doesn't work in the browser version and the controls are a little off, so I recommend downloading the game from the links below. 

Resources used:

               Dafont:

                           Boatman by Ydhra Studio

                           CF Remington Typewriter by CloutierFontes

              Freesound:

                           closet_hit_02 by smokenweewAL

                           Splash, Jumping, C by InspectorJ

                           Running Up The Stairs by RutgerMuller

                           Water,Lapping,Rocky,Beach,Ambience by Filipe Chagas

                           Creepy Background Noise 1 (Loopable) by Osiruswaltz

              Snapsound

                           Large Group, outburst of agony, screaming, distant perspective – CA  Sound

                           Domestic Wooden Staircase Footsteps Running Down Stairs Behind Stairs Perspective With Creaking Thuds – Tom Hutchings
